cancelcontract.cancelmsg: If you would like to cancel service, please call 1-888-466-4427, so we can provide you with pertinent details. We are available 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. EST, Monday-Friday. Thank you and we hope you will consider Ohio Natural Gas in the future.
cancelcontract.cancelterms:
Enrollment eligibility, price plan availability and actual customer service charge, deposit requirement, and price per therm is subject to ONG's credit and payment policies. See onlyong.com for price plans and customer service charge ranges. All price plans are subject to ONG's terms and conditions of service. ONG reserves the right to change or limit the availability of certain price plans.

ONG's variable prices listed on the site apply to customers with a beginning meter reading date (which appears as the “Prior Meter Reading Date” on the bill) on or after 09/05/2017. ONG customers on a variable plan may choose another ONG price plan for which they qualify without a credit check.
